biotools.summary: SPEAQeasy is a Scalable RNA-seq Pipeline for Expression And Quantification based on the RNAseq-pipeline. Built on nextflow, and capable of using Docker containers and utilizing common resource managers (e.g. SLURM), this port of the RNAseq-pipeline can be used in different computer environments.
